title: Contributor Code of Conduct
text: contributors maintainers project, pledge respect people contribute reporting issues, posting feature requests, updating documentation, submitting pull requests patches, activities. committed making participation project harassment-free experience everyone, regardless level experience, gender, gender identity expression, sexual orientation, disability, personal appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, age, religion. Examples unacceptable behavior participants include use sexual language imagery, derogatory comments personal attacks, trolling, public private harassment, insults, unprofessional conduct. Project maintainers right responsibility remove, edit, reject comments, commits, code, wiki edits, issues, contributions aligned Code Conduct. Project maintainers follow Code Conduct may removed project team. Instances abusive, harassing, otherwise unacceptable behavior may reported opening issue contacting one project maintainers. Code Conduct adapted Contributor Covenant (http://contributor-covenant.org), version 1.0.0, available http://contributor-covenant.org/version/1/0/0/

title: Annotation resources
text: Data harvested following resources form backbone oncoEnrichR: Open Targets Platform - human drug-target associations comprehensive disease-target associations CancerMine - literature-mined database drivers, oncogenes tumor suppressors cancer DoRothEA - gene set resource containing signed transcription factor (TF) - target (regulatory) interactions CellChatDB - ligand-receptor interaction resource Cancer Genome Atlas (TCGA) - gene aberration frequencies co-expression patterns ~9,500 primary tumor samples Human Protein Atlas - expression data healthy human tissues (GTex)/cell types, prognostic gene expression associations cancer Molecular Signatures Database (MSigDB) - collection annotated (e.g. towards pathways) genesets enrichment/overrepresentation analysis. includes genesets Gene Ontology, Reactome, KEGG, WikiPathways, BIOCARTA, well curated immunologic cancer-specific signatures. NetPath - signaling transduction pathways STRING - protein-protein interaction database CORUM - protein complex database Compleat - protein complex resource ComplexPortal - manually curated, encyclopaedic resource macromolecular complexes hu.MAP2 - human protein complex map ComPPI - subcellular compartment database Project Score - Database effects cancer cell line viability elicited CRISPR-Cas9 mediated gene activation Genetic determinants survival cancer - Resource relative prognostic impact gene mutation, expression, methylation, CNA human cancers

text: hallmarks cancer comprise six biological capabilities acquired multistep development human tumors. Genes attributed hallmarks cancer retrieved Open Targets Platform/COSMIC

title: Annotation resources
text: Somatic copy number amplifications homozygous deletions retrieved Cancer Genome Atlas (TCGA), focusing gene-level calls processed copy number variation analysis pipeline. Tissue-specific patterns derived Tissue Atlas, tissue specificity derived deep sequencing RNA (RNA-seq) 37 different normal tissue types. putative protein -coding genes classified respect abundance (tissue enriched, tissue enhanced etc.) different tissues. cell type specificity, utilize data Cell Type Atlas. , classification protein-coding genes based single cell type-specific expression 13 different human tissues performed; determining types genes elevated (cell type enriched, cell type enhanced etc.) particular cell type compared cell types.

Two collections interactions subject overlap queryset oncoEnrichR: global set regulatory interactions, many inferred gene expression patterns normal tissues (GTex), cancer-focused set, latter inferred gene expression patterns tumors (TCGA).

title: Running
text: oncoEnrichR performs operations following three functions:

title: Running
text: Loads (web) necessary annotation datasets used oncoEnrichR

title: Running
text: Consists two main processing steps: 1) Takes input/query list human gene/protein identifiers (e.g. UniProt accession, RefSeq/Ensembl transcript identifer etc.) input conducts uniform identifier conversion 2) Performs extensive annotation, enrichment membership analyses query set underlying data sources cancer-relevant properties human genes interrelationships. Technically, method returns list object contents analyses performed. specific arguments/options default values outlined : See detailed descriptions options
code: onco_enrich(   query,   oeDB,   query_id_type = "symbol",   ignore_id_err = TRUE,   html_floating_toc = TRUE,   html_report_theme = "default",   project_title = "Project title",   project_owner = "Project owner",   project_description = "Project description",   bgset = NULL,   bgset_id_type = "symbol",   bgset_description = "All protein-coding genes",   p_value_cutoff_enrichment = 0.05,   p_value_adjustment_method = "BH",   q_value_cutoff_enrichment = 0.2,   min_geneset_size = 10,   max_geneset_size = 500,   num_terms_enrichment_plot = 20,   min_subcellcomp_confidence = 1,   subcellcomp_show_cytosol = FALSE,   min_confidence_reg_interaction = "D",   simplify_go = F,   ppi_add_nodes = 50,   ppi_score_threshold = 900,   show_ppi = T,   show_drugs_in_ppi = T,   show_disease = T,   show_top_diseases_only = T,   show_cancer_hallmarks = T,   show_drug = T,   show_enrichment = T,   show_tcga_aberration = T,   show_tcga_coexpression = T,   show_cell_tissue = F,   show_ligand_receptor = T,   show_regulatory_interactions = T,   show_unknown_function = T,   show_prognostic_cancer_assoc = T,   show_subcell_comp = T,   show_crispr_lof = T,   show_complex = T)

title: Running
text: Consists two main processing steps: 1) Transformation raw analysis results returned oncoEnrichR::onco_enrich() various visualizations interactive tables 2) Assembly generation final analysis report either ) structured interactive oncoEnrichR HTML report, B) multisheet Excel workbook

title: Running
text: target list n = 134 high-confidence interacting proteins c-MYC oncoprotein previously identified BioID protein proximity assay standard cell culture tumor xenografts (Dingar et al., J Proteomics, 2015). ran target list oncoEnrichR analysis workflow using following configurations onco_enrich method: project_title = "cMYC_BioID_screen" project_owner = "Raught et al." produced following HTML report results. R commands provided reproduce example output. NOTE: Replace “LOCAL_FOLDER” directory local computer: library(oncoEnrichR) myc_interact_targets <- read.csv(system.file("extdata","myc_data.csv", package = "oncoEnrichR"), stringsAsFactors = F) oeDB <- oncoEnrichR::load_db() NOTE: pass writable directory argument cache_dir order speed database loading subsequent R sessions myc_report <- oncoEnrichR::onco_enrich(query = myc_interact_targets$symbol, oeDB = oeDB, show_cell_tissue = T, project_title = "cMYC_BioID_screen", project_owner = "Raught et al.") oncoEnrichR::write(report = myc_report, file = "LOCAL_FOLDER/myc_report_oncoenrichr.html", format = "html") oncoEnrichR::write(report = myc_report, file = "LOCAL_FOLDER/myc_report_oncoenrichr.xlsx", format = "excel")

code: @Misc{,   title = {oncoEnrichR: cancer-dedicated gene set interpretation},   author = {Sigve Nakken and Sveinung Gundersen and Fabian L. M. Bernal and Eivind Hovig and Jørgen Wesche},   year = {2021},   eprint = {2107.13247v2},   archiveprefix = {arXiv},   primaryclass = {q-bio.GN},   url = {https://arxiv.org/abs/2107.13247v2}, }

title: Cancer-dedicated gene set interpretation
text: oncoEnrichR R package functional interrogation human genesets context cancer. primarily intended exploratory analysis, interpretation, prioritization long gene lists, represent common output many types high-throughput cancer biology screens. oncoEnrichR can used interrogate results e.g. genetic screens (siRNA/CRISPR), protein proximity labeling, transcriptomics (differential expression). tool queries variety high-quality data resources order assemble useful gene annotations analyses interactive report (examples report shown ). Web-based access oncoEnrichR available https://oncotools.elixir.

title: Cancer-dedicated gene set interpretation
text: contents final report attempt provide answers following questions given gene list: diseases/tumor types known associated genes query set, extent? genes query set attributed cancer hallmark evidence? proteins query sets druggable diffferent cancer conditions (early late clinical development phases)? proteins query set, likelihood druggable? protein complexes involve proteins query set? subcellular compartments (nucleus, cytosol, plasma membrane etc) dominant localizations proteins query set? specific tissues cell types enriched query set, considering tissue/cell-type specific expression patterns target genes? protein-protein interactions known within query set? interactions members query set cancer-relevant proteins (e.g. proto-oncogenes, tumor-suppressors predicted cancer drivers)? proteins constitute hubs protein-protein interaction network? known regulatory interactions (TF-target) found within query set, mode regulation (repressive vs. stimulating)? occurrences known ligand-receptor interactions within query set? specific pathways, biological processes, pre-defined molecular signatures enriched within query set, compared reference/background set? members query set frequently mutated tumor sample cohorts (TCGA, SNVs/InDels, homozygous deletions, copy number amplifications)? members query set co-expressed (strong negative positive correlations) cancer-relevant genes (.e. proto-oncogenes tumor suppressors) tumor sample cohorts (TCGA)? members query set associated better/worse survival different cancers, considering high low gene expression levels, mutation, copy number status tumors? members query set associated cellular loss--fitness CRISPR/Cas9 whole-genome drop screens cancer cell lines (.e. reduction cell viability elicited gene inactivation)? targets prioritized therapeutic targets, considering fitness effects genomic biomarkers combination?

title: Function that initiates oncoEnrichR report structure — init_report
code: init_report(   oeDB,   project_title = "Project title",   project_owner = "Project owner",   html_floating_toc = T,   html_report_theme = "default",   query_id_type = "symbol",   ignore_id_err = TRUE,   project_description = "Project description",   ppi_min_string_score = 900,   ppi_add_nodes = 50,   bgset_description = "All annotated protein-coding genes",   bgset_id_type = "symbol",   p_value_cutoff_enrichment = 0.05,   p_value_adjustment_method = "BH",   q_value_cutoff_enrichment = 0.2,   min_geneset_size = 10,   max_geneset_size = 500,   num_terms_enrichment_plot = 20,   min_subcellcomp_confidence = 1,   subcellcomp_show_cytosol = F,   min_confidence_reg_interaction = "D",   simplify_go = F,   show_ppi = T,   show_drugs_in_ppi = T,   show_disease = T,   show_top_diseases_only = T,   show_cancer_hallmarks = T,   show_drug = T,   show_enrichment = T,   show_tcga_aberration = T,   show_tcga_coexpression = T,   show_subcell_comp = T,   show_crispr_lof = T,   show_cell_tissue = F,   show_ligand_receptor = T,   show_regulatory_interactions = T,   show_unknown_function = T,   show_prognostic_cancer_assoc = T,   show_complex = T )

title: Function that initiates oncoEnrichR report structure — init_report
text: oeDB oncoEnrichR annotation database object project_title project title (title report) project_owner name project owner html_floating_toc logical - float table contents left main document content. floating table contents always visible even document scrolled html_report_theme Bootswatch theme HTML report ("bootstrap","cerulean","cosmo","default","flatly","journal","lumen","paper","sandstone","simplex","spacelab","united","yeti") query_id_type character indicating source query (one "uniprot_acc", "symbol", "entrezgene", "ensembl_gene","ensembl_mrna","refseq_mrna","ensembl_protein","refseq_protein") ignore_id_err logical indicating analysis continue uknown query identifiers encountered project_description project background information ppi_min_string_score minimum score (0-1000) retrieval protein-protein interactions (STRING) ppi_add_nodes number nodes add target set computing protein-protein interaction network (STRING) bgset_description character indicating type background (e.g. "lipid-binding proteins (n = 200)") bgset_id_type character indicating source query (one "uniprot_acc", "symbol", "entrezgene", "ensembl_gene","ensembl_mrna","refseq_mrna","ensembl_protein","refseq_protein") p_value_cutoff_enrichment cutoff p-value enrichment/-representation analysis p_value_adjustment_method one "holm", "hochberg", "hommel", "bonferroni", "BH", "", "fdr", "none" q_value_cutoff_enrichment cutoff q-value enrichment analysis min_geneset_size minimal size geneset annotated term testing enrichment/-representation analysis max_geneset_size maximal size geneset annotated term testing enrichment/-representation analysis num_terms_enrichment_plot number top enriched Gene Ontology terms (max) show enrichment barplot min_subcellcomp_confidence minimum confidence level subcellular compartment annotations (range 1 6, 6 strongest) subcellcomp_show_cytosol logical indicating subcellular heatmap highlight cytosol subcellular protein location min_confidence_reg_interaction minimum confidence level regulatory interactions (TF-target) retrieved DoRothEA ('','B','C', 'D') simplify_go remove highly similar GO terms results GO enrichment/-representation analysis show_ppi logical indicating report contain protein-protein interaction data (STRING) show_drugs_in_ppi logical indicating targeted drugs (> phase 3) displayed protein-protein interaction network (Open Targets Platform) show_disease logical indicating report contain disease associations (Open Targets Platform, association_score >= 0.05, support least two data types) show_top_diseases_only logical indicating report contain top (n = 20) disease associations pr. query gene (Open Targets Platform) show_cancer_hallmarks logical indicating report contain annotations/evidence cancer hallmarks per query gene (COSMIC/Open Targets Platform) show_drug logical indicating report contain targeted cancer drug information show_enrichment logical indicating report contain functional enrichment/-representation analysis (MSigDB, GO, KEGG, REACTOME, NetPath, WikiPathways) show_tcga_aberration logical indicating report contain TCGA aberration plots (amplifications/deletions) show_tcga_coexpression logical indicating report contain TCGA co-expression data (RNAseq) query set oncogenes/tumor suppressor genes show_subcell_comp logical indicating report provide subcellular compartment annotations (ComPPI) show_crispr_lof logical indicating report provide fitness scores target priority scores CRISPR/Cas9 loss--fitness screens (Project Score) show_cell_tissue logical indicating report contain tissue-specificity single cell-type specificity assessments (Human Protein Atlas) target genes, using data Human Protein Atlas show_ligand_receptor logical indicating report contain ligand-receptor interactions (CellChatDB) show_regulatory_interactions logical indicating report contain data transcription factor (TF) - target interactions relevant query set (DoRothEA) show_unknown_function logical indicating report highlight target genes unknown poorly defined functions (GO/Uniprot KB/NCBI) show_prognostic_cancer_assoc logical indicating mRNA-based (single-gene) prognostic associations cancer types listed (Human Protein Atlas/TCGA) show_complex logical indicating report provide target memberships known protein complexes (ComplexPortal/Compleat/PDB/CORUM)

text: query character vector gene/query identifiers oeDB oncoEnrichR annotation database - returned oncoEnrichR::load_db() query_id_type character indicating source query (one "uniprot_acc", "symbol", "entrezgene", "ensembl_gene","ensembl_mrna","refseq_mrna","ensembl_protein","refseq_protein") ignore_id_err logical indicating analysis continue uknown query identifiers encountered html_floating_toc logical - float table contents left main document content (HTML report). floating table contents always visible even document scrolled html_report_theme Bootswatch theme HTML report ("bootstrap","cerulean","cosmo","default","flatly","journal","lumen","paper","sandstone","simplex","spacelab","united","yeti") project_title project title (title report) project_owner name project owner project_description project background information bgset character vector gene identifiers, used reference/background enrichment/-representation analysis bgset_id_type character indicating source background ("uniprot_acc","symbol","entrezgene","ensembl_gene_id") bgset_description character indicating type background (e.g. "lipid-binding proteins (n = 200)") p_value_cutoff_enrichment cutoff p-value enrichment/-representation analysis p_value_adjustment_method one "holm", "hochberg", "hommel", "bonferroni", "BH", "", "fdr", "none" q_value_cutoff_enrichment cutoff q-value enrichment analysis min_geneset_size minimal size geneset annotated term testing enrichment/-representation analysis max_geneset_size maximal size geneset annotated term testing enrichment/-representation analysis num_terms_enrichment_plot number top enriched Gene Ontology terms (max) show enrichment barplot min_subcellcomp_confidence minimum confidence level subcellular compartment annotations (range 1 6, 6 strongest) subcellcomp_show_cytosol logical indicating subcellular heatmap show highlight proteins located cytosol min_confidence_reg_interaction minimum confidence level regulatory interactions (TF-target) retrieved DoRothEA ('','B','C', 'D') simplify_go remove highly similar GO terms results GO enrichment/-representation analysis ppi_add_nodes number nodes add target set computing protein-protein interaction network (STRING) ppi_score_threshold minimum score (0-1000) retrieval protein-protein interactions (STRING) show_ppi logical indicating report contain protein-protein interaction data (STRING) show_drugs_in_ppi logical indicating targeted drugs (> phase 3) displayed protein-protein interaction network (Open Targets Platform) show_disease logical indicating report contain disease associations (Open Targets Platform, association_score >= 0.05, support least two data types) show_top_diseases_only logical indicating report contain top (n = 20) disease associations pr. query gene (Open Targets Platform) show_cancer_hallmarks logical indicating report contain annotations/evidence cancer hallmarks per query gene (COSMIC/Open Targets Platform) show_drug logical indicating report contain targeted cancer drug information show_enrichment logical indicating report contain functional enrichment/-representation analysis (MSigDB, GO, KEGG, REACTOME, NetPath, WikiPathways) show_tcga_aberration logical indicating report contain TCGA aberration plots (amplifications/deletions) show_tcga_coexpression logical indicating report contain TCGA co-expression data (RNAseq) query set oncogenes/tumor suppressor genes show_cell_tissue logical indicating report contain tissue-specificity single cell-type specificity assessments (Human Protein Atlas) target genes, using data Human Protein Atlas show_ligand_receptor logical indicating report contain ligand-receptor interactions (CellChatDB) show_regulatory_interactions logical indicating report contain data transcription factor (TF) - target interactions relevant query set (DoRothEA) show_unknown_function logical indicating report highlight target genes unknown poorly defined functions (GO/Uniprot KB/NCBI) show_prognostic_cancer_assoc logical indicating mRNA-based (single-gene) prognostic associations cancer types listed (Human Protein Atlas/TCGA) show_subcell_comp logical indicating report provide subcellular compartment annotations (ComPPI) show_crispr_lof logical indicating report provide fitness scores target priority scores CRISPR/Cas9 loss--fitness screens (Project Score) show_complex logical indicating report provide target memberships known protein complexes (ComplexPortal/Compleat/PDB/CORUM) ... arguments Galaxy/web-based processing

title: Function that writes an oncoEnrichR report object to file — write
text: report object oncoEnrichR report data (returned oeDB$onco_enrich) file full filename report output (e.g. "oe_report.html", "oe_report.xlsx") ignore_file_extension logical accept type filaname extensions (Galaxy integration) overwrite logical indicating existing output files may overwritten format file format output (html/excel) ... options Galaxy/non self-contained HTML. applicable use Galaxy

title: Version 1.0.7
text: WikiPathways (20211110) Open Targets Platform (2021.11) EFO (v3.36.0) TCGA (v31, 2021-10-29) CancerMine (v40) Human Protein Atlas (v21) UniProt KB (2021_04) PFAM domains (release 35, November 2021)

title: Version 1.0.7
text: Management annotation databases re-designed, reducing size installation oncoEnrichR significantly. re-design results addition initial step analysis; database loading.

title: Version 1.0.6
text: KEGG (20211013) WikiPathways (20211010) Open Targets Platform (2021.09) EFO (v3.35.0), DiseaseOntology (v2021-10-11) TCGA (v30, 2021-09-23) Protein complex annotations - additions Compleat, ComplexPortal, PDB, hu.MAP2 View overlap members queryset previously established regulatory interactions (TF-target relationships) DoRothEA resource Explore potential ligand-receptor interactions query set, found CellChat database Choose Bootswatch theme HTML report - option html_report_theme Choose table contents placed HTML report (floating-left static top) - option html_floating_toc html_floating_toc - logical, set FALSE, table contents HTML report placed top main document html_report_theme - character, choose different Bootswatch themes style HTML report show_regulatory - logical, show regulatory interactions module (DoRothEA) min_confidence_reg_interaction - character, minimum confidence regulatory interactions included DoRothEA (‘’,‘B’,‘C’, ‘D’) show_ligand_receptor - logical, show ligand-receptor interaction module (CellChatDB) num_terms_enrichment_plot - integer, number enriched Gene Ontology terms (max) show enrichment barplots (module Functional Enrichment) modules Regulatory Interactions Tissue cell type enrichment, interactions/targets ranked according quantitative cancer association score cancer_max_rank (maximum gene-cancer association rank (Open Targets Platform) across primary sites)

title: Version 1.0.6
text: Report disclaimer occurring bottom report longer missing web-based analysis (oncotools.elixir.) - file _site.yml inst/templates

title: Version 1.0.5
text: Data updates: KEGG (20210916), WikiPathways (20210910), CancerMine (v39), EFO (v3.34.0)

title: Version 1.0.4
text: Data updates: Open Targets Platform (21.06), CancerMine (v37) Software upgrades: multiple R packages, including clusterProfiler (4.0.2)

title: Version 1.0.3
text: Functionality Galaxy-specific HTML output (non-selfcontained HTML) Data updates: WikiPathways (20210610), KEGG (20210610), CancerMine (v36, 20210611) Web-based interface oncoEnrichR available: oncotools.elixir.

title: Version 1.0.3
text: Minor typos HTML output Ambiguous Entrez gene identifiers (towards gene symbols)

title: Version 1.0.0
text: Added prognostic Z-scores also methylation features (Smith et al., bioRxiv, 2021) keep file size output Excel/HTML managable levels, maximum size queryset reduced n = 600 genes

title: Version 1.0.0
text: Fixed assymetrical scales prognostic Z-score plots decrease size HTML report, limited datatable output recurrent somatic SNVs/InDels sCNA frequencies top 2,500 (full set kept Excel output)
